summary: This document is an email chain from August 28, 2019, discussing travel plans for federal prosecutors to Palm Beach to conduct a proffer session with an individual as part of the ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's co-conspirators. The emails also reference a successful meeting with victims the previous day.

events.title: Meeting with Epstein victims
events.description: Prosecutors met with victims of Jeffrey Epstein, who were described as very grateful. The meeting was helpful to the ongoing investigation.

events.title: Planned travel for proffer session
events.description: Federal prosecutors requested permission to travel to Palm Beach to conduct a proffer session with an individual regarding the investigation into Epstein's co-conspirators. Planned to fly in on Tuesday and out on Wednesday.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated August 28, 2019, referencing events from the previous day (August 27).
Federal prosecutors successfully met with Epstein victims on August 27, 2019, and found the victims very grateful.
Prosecutors requested permission to travel to Palm Beach the following week for a proffer session as part of the investigation into Epstein's co-conspirators.
The document indicates an active investigation into Epstein's co-conspirators was ongoing in late August 2019.
All personal names and email addresses in the document are redacted, indicated by placeholders like (USANYS) and blank fields.
